item.title: Miles ahead and still racing
item.author: Sorin Cioban,
item.description: In February, right after using my first generation iPad for about six months, I knew Apple would soon launch its successor so I sold it in order to buy the new one whenever it came out. Not long passed before the end of term came, and I started queuing for the iPad 2 about 17 hours before it was â€¦
